description: When the enemy summons a follower, grant it <link=keyword.Ephemeral><sprite name=Ephemeral><style=Keyword>Ephemeral</style></link>.
descriptionRaw: When the enemy summons a follower, grant it Ephemeral.
flavorText: “Run. Fight. Cower. It matters not, the shadows have come for you.”
name: Ren Shadowblade
